title: Multivariable Calculus
description: Vectors, curves, partial derivatives, multiple integrals, vector calculus.

title: Introduction to Biomechanics
description: Foundations of biomechanics including statics, dynamics, and material properties of biological systems.

title: Systems Physiology
description: Quantitative analysis of human physiological systems including cardiovascular, respiratory, and neural systems.

title: Bioengineering Laboratory I
description: Laboratory techniques in bioengineering. Emphasis on experimental design and data analysis. Lab component required.

title: Biomaterials
description: Structure, properties, and applications of biomaterials in medical devices and tissue engineering.

title: Tissue Engineering
description: Principles of tissue engineering including scaffolds, cell culture, and regenerative medicine.

title: Medical Device Design
description: Design and development of medical devices. FDA regulations, prototyping, and clinical testing.

title: General Chemistry I
description: Fundamental principles of chemistry including atomic structure, bonding, and thermodynamics.

title: General Chemistry II
description: Continuation of general chemistry including kinetics, equilibrium, and electrochemistry. Lab component.

title: Biochemistry
description: Structure and function of proteins, nucleic acids, carbohydrates, and lipids. Enzyme kinetics and metabolism.

title: Introduction to Computer Programming
description: Introduction to programming using Python. Problem-solving, algorithms, and data structures.

title: Algorithmic Thinking
description: Design and analysis of algorithms. Complexity, graphs, dynamic programming.

title: Introduction to Program Design
description: Software design, object-oriented programming in Java, testing, and debugging.

title: Introduction to Computer Systems
description: Computer architecture, assembly language, operating systems, and system-level programming.

title: Tools and Models of Data Science
description: Statistical methods, machine learning basics, and data analysis using Python and R.

title: Reasoning About Algorithms
description: Advanced algorithm design techniques including approximation, randomization, and complexity theory.

title: Database Systems
description: Relational databases, SQL, normalization, transactions, and query optimization.

title: Artificial Intelligence
description: Search algorithms, knowledge representation, machine learning, and neural networks.

title: Honors Linear Algebra
description: Vector spaces, linear transformations, eigenvalues, and applications.

title: Probability and Statistics
description: Probability theory, random variables, distributions, hypothesis testing, and regression.
